description: Based on a novel by Roni Schotter, this film chronicles a 16-year-old girl's painful period of growth as she confronts her mother's inevitable death from a malignant tumor. In the process, she emerges from behind her mother's shadow and discovers her own special talent. Cast includes Karlene Crocket, Rob Lowe, Rosemary Forsythe, Carrie Freeman, Kate Bentall, Malcolm Groome.
